1.name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
1.completeEffect: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

2.name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
2.completeEffect: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

3.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
3.completeEffect: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

4.name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
4.completeEffect: Increases DMG by the wearer's Skill by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for the next attack.

5.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
5.completeEffect: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

6.name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
6.completeEffect: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50%, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

7.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
7.completeEffect: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

8.name: Knight of Purity Palace
8.completeEffect: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by 20%.

9.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
9.completeEffect: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and DMG dealt by Basic ATK increases by 10%.

10.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
10.completeEffect: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.

11.name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
11.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. After the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

12.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
12.completeEffect: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

13.name: Belobog of the Architects
13.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

14.name: Celestial Differentiator
14.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

15.name: Fleet of the Ageless
15.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

16.name: Inert Salsotto
16.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack increases by 15%.

17.name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
17.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

18.name: Space Sealing Station
18.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

19.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
19.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

20.name: Longevous Disciple
20.completeEffect: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

21.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
21.completeEffect: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

22.name: Broken Keel
22.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

23.name: Rutilant Arena
23.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill increases by 20%.

24.name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
24.completeEffect: For every DoT the enemy target is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of its DEF when dealing DMG to it. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

25.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
25.baseEffect: Increases the DMG dealt by follow-up attack by 20%.
25.completeEffect: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks, increases the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack up to 8 time(s) and lasts for 3 turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

26.name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
26.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

27.name: Penacony, Land of the Dreams
27.completeEffect: Increases wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. Increases DMG by 10% for all other allies that are of the same Type as the wearer.

28.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
28.baseEffect: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuffs by 12%.
28.completeEffect: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

29.name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
29.completeEffect: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, all allies' Break Effect increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

30.name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
30.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

31.name: Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation
31.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 4%. When an enemy target gets defeated, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 4%, stacking up to 10 time(s).

32.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
32.completeEffect: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, the Break DMG dealt to the enemy target ignores 10% of their DEF. If the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG dealt to the enemy target additionally ignores 15% of their DEF.

33.name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
33.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. After the wearer uses follow-up attack, increases DMG dealt by Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

34.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
34.completeEffect: When an ally uses follow-up attack, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 time(s). Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

35.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
35.completeEffect: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).
